body.name: Purple Gel Seat Cushion - Honeycomb Cooling Seat Cushion Back Support, Pressure Relief & Long Sitting - Non-Slip Chair Cushion Traveling, Wheelchair, Car Seat, Office & Gaming Chair
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 40 mins
features: 【Double Layer Gel Seat Cushion】The chair cushion comprises a two-layer gel cushion that is thicker and comfier, helping a variety of areas in pain, including sciatica, back pain, and tailbone issues.
【Ergonomically Designed】The purple cushion has a honeycomb seat cushion gel design for breathability and heat dissipation, and an integrated, free-flowing air channel keeps the seat from sweating.

【Soft & Sturdy】The gel seat cushion has a resiliency that protects it from fast wear. Distinguishable by its elastic gel content, it returns to its original shape after being stretched and compressed.
【Versatile Cooling Seat Cushion】 The purple seat cushion is ideal for use at the workplace, at home, while traveling, in a wheelchair, in a chair, or in a car seat. Great for anyone.
【Comfortable & User-Friendly】 Our deep purple gel seat cushion has a ventilated mesh cover, and a therapeutic thick honeycomb gel design to improve airflow for ultimate cooling comfort.
body.description: Our aim with this pressure relief seat cushion is to provide a seat comfort for the chair that is ergonomically designed to reduce pain effectively ] for a variety of people who suffer from numerous occupational disorders such as cervical spondylosis, lumbar disc herniation, Coccyx pain, etc. Additionally, the wheelchair cushion is excellent for those who use wheelchairs and for pregnant women suffering from back issues. The gel seat cushion for long sitting has a honeycomb structure, which allows it to be breathable and circulate air, keeping you comfortable and fresh at all times. In addition, the elastic gel material will maintain its shape over time and will not lose its support. The high-quality gel used to make the foam seat cushion has been enhanced and thickened for extra comfort while sitting down due to the soft, premium material used. The honeycomb gel construction improves airflow, keeps you cool, and significantly lowers heat transfer from beneath to the seat. The butt pillow has been enhanced with a double layer of thickness for more support and equally distributed pressure. The double seat cushion is lightweight and flexible, making it simple to use wherever you are.【Portable & Lightweight】Take the computer chair cushion wherever suitable for use during driving, going on road trips, going to athletic events, having picnics, going to the water, and so much more. The computer chair cushion is lightweight enough for easy transportation and portability.【Largely Sized】With the spacious egg sitter, the ergonomic seat cushion offers optimal support for total relaxation while being gentle on any pressure spots, suitable for all individuals suffering from back issues.【Package Include】1 x Soft Gel Seat Cushion with Honeycomb Design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-made product that's extremely comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I weigh 240 pounds and this product is so comfortable and does not smash down or lose shape. It is perfect in my desk chair at work where I sit daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as good as Purple
reviews.reviewText: I spent a lot of money on Purple brand seat cushion. It was excellent. I have it to a friend who has worse back problems than me. I decided to try this less expensive one. It's just as good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected...
reviews.reviewText: The cushion is too small and not deep enough to provide any additional comfort though the price was not bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have not had a Purple cushion before so I can't compare those two, but this one is pretty nice. I have an office job, but I also have very bad hips. Sitting all day makes me crazy sore and "locks" my hips up. Before I got this, I had to go on walks every other hour or so. Now, I can sit and focus without feeling like the bottom half of my body is actively dying. It does not stay in place though, so I'm often standing up to adjust it, but I'd take that over not having this.I'm a plus size person and my butt fits just fine on this, it doesn't feel weird or too small for me.4 stars because it gets annoying to have to adjust the damn thing every 30 minutes to an hour, but again, is rather have it than not

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Product is super small and doesn't match up to product description. No padding or support provided. It's honestly like sitting on a cheap gym pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great topper for motorcycle seats
reviews.reviewText: Provide great comfort while riding a motorcycle and give adequate ventilation sense it gives about a 1” buffer between you and your motorcycle seat. I’ll have to give a more detailed review once I take a 4 or 5 hour ride.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am a 6' 3" 300 lbs guy and really like the product because it increased the pleasure of riding by eliminating the annoying vibration comes from the little bumps and such. I highly recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as supportive as I had hoped; temper your expectations.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a topper to my office chair that could get uncomfortable after a bit. I didn't want anything thick and seeing these for some time now I decided to give it a chance. THe results were meh at best. Truthfully I ended up abandoning it and just going back to the normal seat without any added cushion. I found that I had circulation issues and other discomfort while using this that I never encountered prior to using it. I now use it on a chair I regularly sit in to eat meals from and it is great on the hardwood chair surface. Although I am rarely using it more than 20 minutes at a time in that capacity so as a long term solution in such a case, I can't attest to.
